articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Various Construction Projects
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Various Construction Projects 
						
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, inspected various projects being undertaken by the KPA.
					 The first leg of his inspection was the construction site of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.
					
					 Watching the gatepost of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower under construction, he noted with satisfaction that a combination of white granite and red-brown stone to make it appear in contrast helps preserve its nature well.
					
					 He went round the main building of the museum. At the main lobby where the statue of President Kim Il Sung will stand, he was pleased to note that the remodeling of the ceiling of the vestibule makes it look refreshed and imposing, its depth ensured.
					
					 He dropped in at the Hall "Taejon". He said that soldiers built pillars and a corridor connecting the two buildings on both sides of River Pothong in a peculiar manner so that they look the same edifice and constructed the hall in such manner that one can hardly find its former appearance.
					
					 Feasting his eyes on the exhibition of weapons seen by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and those of merit and the exhibition of enemy weapons, built behind subsidiary group sculptures, he set forth tasks for lowering their roofs and remodeling them to match the environment.
					
					 Seeing the museum again and again, he said that the longer he looks at it, the more spectacular it appears, and expressed great satisfaction over the fact and it has been successfully built to meet the requirements of architectural beauty and formative art.
					
					 He advanced concrete tasks and ways to speed up the construction of the museum and ensure its quality.
					
					 The next leg of his inspection was the Munsu Wading Pool under construction.
					
					 He highly praised the soldier-builders for having done a lot of work in a brief span of time, overcoming obstacles and difficulties in a revolutionary soldier spirit.
					
					 He learned about the construction force and equipment and the supply of building materials, underscoring the need to push forward the project as planned.
					
					 He stressed that deep attention should be paid to the construction of the wading pool conducive to providing school youth and children and other people with conditions for pleasant sporting and cultural rest.
					
					 He told the commanding officers to report about the progress made in the project everyday, calling on them to build it wonderfully as a cultural recreation ground for people so that it may stand impeccable even in a distant future.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the soldier-builders would complete without fail the project by October 10, the founding anniversary of the WPK, bearing in mind the intention of the Supreme Commander.
					
					 Then he visited the Mirim Riding Club under construction.
					
					 He saw the general map of the club and the miniatures of its indoor training ground. Recalling that he sent information about riding schools in different countries and a lot of reference books to build the club on a world level, he criticized the officials for failing neither to use them as reference nor study them and building it in a manner completely different from the design he had instructed to send to a designing organ of the KPA among those reported to him by various designing institutions.
					
					  In order to build the club well, it is necessary to rearrange the main course and, at the same time, separately construct the building of a riding school, service building, indoor riding training ground and stalls and measures should also be taken to solve the traffic problem satisfactorily, he pointed out.
					
					 He stressed the need to plant many trees around the club to match natural environment and build an artificial mountain and stroll roads in the vast area in the middle of the main course to provide the visitors with ample conditions for rest.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, and Hwang Pyong So and Ma Won Chun, vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Participants in Medical Symposium Pay Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Participants in Medical Symposium Pay Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 15th Pyongyang symposium on medical science of Koreans at home and abroad visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill here on Monday.
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues in deep reverence for the peerlessly great men who wisely led the work to develop the Juche-oriented medical science before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Birthday Spread to Centenarian 
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Jon Kyong Sun in Kuup-ri, Pongsan County, North Hwanghae Province on the centenary of her birth.
					 She was subject to all sorts of maltreatment and contempt as a member of the stateless nation before the liberation of the country. It was not until Generalissimo Kim Il Sung liberated the country that she could lead a worthwhile life.
					
					 She devoted herself to farming for decades. She did a lot of good work to help boost the grain production even after becoming a pensioner.
					
					 She has always told her sons and daughters to devote themselves to the benevolent party and country, saying that she enjoys a long and healthy life thanks to the best socialist system serving the people.

articles.title: Symposium on Medical Science Held
articles.content:
Symposium on Medical Science Held 
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The 15th Pyongyang symposium on medical science of Koreans at home and abroad took place at the Grand People's Study House on Monday. 
					 Present there were Kim Hyong Hun, chairman of the Central Committee of the Medical Association of Korea, officials, scientists and teachers in the field of public health and the delegation of Korean medical persons in Japan led by Kim Tae Sik, vice-chairman of the Korean Health Workers Association in Japan. 
					
					 Kim Hyong Hun in his opening address expressed belief that the symposium would contribute to developing the medical science and technology of the Korean nation on a higher stage, intensifying the movement for national reunification and achieving the prosperity of the country.
					
					 Kim Tae Sik in his congratulatory speech said that the homeland making a leap forward under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is instilling strength and courage into the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The Korean Health Workers Association in Japan will make a contribution to preserving the Juche character and national identity and developing medical science and technology in the homeland, he noted. 
					
					 A lecture "On Advantages of Socialist Public Health System in Our Country" was given at the symposium. 
					
					 Diverse papers were presented at the symposium. The speakers explained research successes and experience gained in the work to solve urgent issues arising in healthcare and in the course of introducing latest science and technology into the prevention and treatment of diseases.

articles.title: Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics Held
articles.content:
Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics Held
						
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The 8th Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics was held at the Central Youth Hall on Monday.
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Vice-Premier Kim In Sik, chairman of the Capital City Construction Commission, and officials, designers, researchers, technicians, creators, teachers and students in the fields of architecture, construction and building materials.
					
					 The floor was taken by Kwon Song Ho, minister of State Construction Control, Yun Kum Ryong, vice-director of the Paektusan Architectural Institute, and Pae Tong Il, president of Pyongyang University of Architecture.
					
					 The speakers referred to the immortal feats Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un performed in the field of construction and proved the validity and vitality of the WPK's idea and theory of architectural aesthetics and dealt with issues arising in the construction of monumental edifices.
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, monumental edifices and many buildings have appeared in Pyongyang in recent years to contribute to the Korean people's cultural and emotional life, they noted.
					
					 They explained the originality and vitality of the theory of convenience-first and architectural beauty-next newly expounded by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 This theory provides a firm guarantee for preserving the purity of the Juche-oriented architecture and making the architecture in the country serve the purpose of creating a revolutionary and popular one from A to Z and sets forth important guidelines to be held fast to  in architecture, they said.

articles.title: Scientific and Technological Exhibition Held
articles.content:
Scientific, Technological Exhibition Held
						
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The 9th National Scientific and Technological Exhibition in the Field of Machine Designing was held at the Central Light Industrial Sample Exhibition from May 2 to 6.
					 On display there were at least 390 designs, more than 80 programs for the study of designs and support programs and data bases and over 30 designs for machines.
					
					 The exhibition involved an exchange of technologies for designing new type machines and a swap of experience.

articles.title: Korean Women's Wedding Dresses
articles.content:
Korean Women's Wedding Dresses
						
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- From olden times, the Korean women customarily wear chima (skirt) and jogori (jacket), a traditional Korean costume, in their wedding ceremonies.
					 Brides in the costume look very beautiful and elegant.
					
					 In this regard, KCNA met Jong Yong Sun, chief of the Sosong Korean Tailor's Shop.
					
					 Jong said:
					
					 Wedding dresses have been considered most gorgeous among national costumes the Korean women wear.
					
					 Typical of them is green jogori and crimson chima.
					
					 Light pink chima and jogori has become a fashionable dress in present days.
					
					 Light pink color is believed to be symbolic of happiness of grooms and brides as it represents the springtime of life.
					
					 The costumes' color should conform to national character and modern aesthetic sense.
					
					 Wedding dresses have their own features in each locality.

articles.title: WPK Is Called Mother Party: Newspaper
articles.content:
WPK Is Called Mother Party: Newspaper 
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is called a great mother party. This is the true picture of the WPK  led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un and an ever-lasting signpost of the party building and activities. Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a jointly signed article. 
					 Noting that the history of the WPK shines as a sacred one of the building of the great mother party, the article goes on:
					
					 The WPK is now fully equipped with the Juche-oriented outlook on people and it is prevalent with the work-style to thoroughly apply it. A man devotedly serving the people is praised as an official faithful to the party and a party organization making a big contribution to improving the people's living standard is regarded as a good one. This is the true picture of the WPK. 
					
					 It is the strict rule of the party work to consider as most serious any practice of behaving contrary to public mind-set, forsaken by the people, and struggle against it without any slightest  concession and connivance. 
					
					 The WPK has explored a new phase in building a mother party thanks to the prominent people's leader. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the tender-hearted father of the people as he is translating the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's noble intentions of believing in people as in Heaven into the most brilliant reality. 
					
					 There will be neither slight change nor a slight deviation in the characteristic feature of the WPK as a great mother party faithfully serving the people as long as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The WPK will remain true to its noble mission responsible for the destiny of the people in any storm and stress and surely build on this land the best country to be envied by the world.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Dismisses S. Korean Authorities' Smear Campaign against DPRK as Ridiculous
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Dismisses S. Korean Authorities' Smear Campaign against DPRK as Ridiculous 
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- If the south Korean authorities persistently pursue a policy of confrontation with the DPRK, antagonizing compatriots, it will only touch off a storm of popular protest and result in throwing them into the dumping ground  of history as was the case with the Lee Myung Bak regime. They should bear this in mind. Rodong Sinmun Monday warns this in a bylined article.
					 It continues:
					
					 Such moves to escalate the confrontation with Pyongyang are an unpardonable treason as they mean a repetition of the crimes committed by the former traitorous regime.
					
					 The danger of a nuclear war is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula entirely because of the acts of treachery committed by the south Korean puppet regime. It has gone reckless in its racket to stifle the DPRK in collusion with outside forces out of deep-rooted hostility towards the ideology and social system of the compatriots.
					
					 The present puppet regime of south Korea is following in the footsteps of the Lee Myung Bak group in the smear campaign against the DPRK over its "human rights issue".
					
					 The south Korean warlike forces are letting loose such torrent of outbursts as crying out for "decisive punishment" as part of the smear campaign against the just countermeasures for self-defense taken by the DPRK, pushing the situation to a more uncontrollable phase.
					
					 The puppet forces are now employing such sleight of hand as proposing "dialogue" in a bid to evade the blame for the serious situation, a product of their confrontation policy, and conceal their traitorous nature.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities have the genuine will to have dialogue, they should stop their wordplay, draw a lesson from the catastrophic consequences of their reckless confrontation policy and apologize for all their traitorous acts.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Foolish Farce under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Foolish Farce under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities brought together human scum who defected from the DPRK for an "event of week for freedom" from the end of April to May 4. At this event they groundlessly slandered the DPRK over "human rights" and the like. Some members of the "Saenuri Party" appeared there to cry out for muscling the "bill on human rights in the north through the National Assembly" this year without fail, kicking up confrontation hysteria. The south Korean Intelligence Service fabricated the fictitious "spy-ring case of defectors" in a bid to tarnish the image of the DPRK and stir up hostility towards it. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The "event of week for freedom" and the "spy-ring case of defectors" orchestrated by the south Korean authorities are renewed charades to tarnish the dignified social system in the DPRK and keep the north-south relations in the worst phase.
					
					 With no frenzy can they obscure the bright prospect of single-mindedly united Korean socialism winning one victory after another thanks to the intense loyalty and strong sense of obligation of all the service personnel and people towards their leader. 
					
					 They kicked off another hysteric anti-DPRK smear campaign over "spy-ring case" in an effort to save their confrontation policy from a total failure and escalate the confrontation with the DPRK. 
					
					 They would be well advised to bear in mind that such poor charades would get them nowhere.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korea Plan Joint Maritime Drills
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea Plan Joint Maritime Drills
						
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and naval force of the puppet army of south Korea are mulling staging joint maritime drills before and after May 10, according to south Korean CBS.
					 The warmongers said that the projected joint military exercises would be staged under a plan for increasing the number of joint maritime drills after the Cheonan warship sinking case.
					
					 It was reported that the Aegis destroyer, sea-patrol plane, submarine and others of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and puppet army would be involved in the military exercises for detecting and attacking the DPRK's submarines.
					
					 The U.S. and puppet warmongers are frantically intensifying the war drills for invading the DPRK in a bid to extend the "May 24 measures" for confrontation taken under the pretext of the said case.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korea Kick off Naval Strike Drills
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea Kick Off Naval Strike Drills
						
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the puppet warlike forces of south Korea kicked off joint military exercises for striking areas of the north from the West Sea of Korea on Monday, according to south Korean KBS.
					 A nuclear submarine, Aegis destroyer and various other warships were involved in the exercises which would last till May 10 under the signboard of combined anti-submarine exercises.
					
					 They plan to hurl even the U.S. nuclear-powered aircraft carrier Nimitz into the naval strike drill in the East Sea of Korea in the wake of the saber-rattling.
					
					 They are intensifying the anti-north war drills with reinforced nuclear force in a bid to ignite a nuclear war at any cost.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Slammed by Korean in U.S.
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Slammed by Korean in U.S. 
						
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The chairperson of the National Culture and Arts Panel  of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. made public an article in protest against the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 The U.S. forces have brought unspeakable misery and pain to the Korean nation since they illegally occupied south Korea in 1945, the article said, and went on:
					
					 There is no justification for them to stay in south Korea, but the U.S. is seeking its permanent military presence under the pretext of fictitious "threat" from the north.
					
					 It has staged ceaseless nuclear war drills against the DPRK and, at the same time, introduced huge latest war hardware into south Korea, straining the situation to an extreme phase.
					
					 The U.S. has left no means untried to stifle the north, even resorting to hideous state-sponsored political terrorism to hurt the dignity of its supreme leadership, not content with putting pressure on it and showing off military muscle in a bid to bring it to its knees. But all this proved futile.
					
					 The reason for the U.S. setback can be explained by the fact that its rival is not Iraq or Libya, but the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will put an end to the history of confrontation with the U.S. before long.

articles.title: KPA Will Surely Win Final Victory: British Organization
articles.content:
KPA Will Surely Win Final Victory: British Organization
						
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association in its statement on April 25 expressed belief that the Korean People's Army (KPA) would surely win a final victory under the Songun revolutionary leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Korean People's Revolutionary Army crushed Japanese imperialism and achieved the country's liberation under the outstanding leadership of Kim Il Sung, invincible and iron-willed commander.
					
					 It was developed into the KPA, regular revolutionary armed forces, in 1948.
					
					 The KPA formed with excellent sons and daughters of the workers and farmers is defending the sovereignty of the nation and the lives and properties of the people.
					
					 The KPA won one victory after another in the battle minus gunfire against U.S. imperialism in the past under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 It has performed shining exploits in defending socialism from the U.S.-led enemies' moves against the DPRK under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
